definitions.definition: An act of blushing; a pink or red glow on the face caused by embarrassment, shame, shyness, love, etc.
A glow ; a flush of colour, especially pink or red.
( figuratively ) A feeling or appearance of optimism.
( uncountable , countable ) A sort of makeup , frequently a powder , used to redden the cheeks .
A color between pink and cream .
( chiefly US ) A pale pink wine made by removing the dark grape skins at the required point during fermentation .

main_definition: An act of blushing; a pink or red glow on the face caused by embarrassment, shame, shyness, love, etc.
secondary_definitions: A glow ; a flush of colour, especially pink or red.
( figuratively ) A feeling or appearance of optimism.
( uncountable , countable ) A sort of makeup , frequently a powder , used to redden the cheeks .
A color between pink and cream .
( chiefly US ) A pale pink wine made by removing the dark grape skins at the required point during fermentation .

definitions.definition: The collective noun for a group of boys .

main_definition: The collective noun for a group of boys .
